titleStmt.title: Act, allowing the depute for the Privy Seal to subscribe the writs passing the same. At Edinburgh, January 23. 1690.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Eliot, Gilbert, Sir, 1651-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of Privy Council,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
